sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_script_15609efcdb58e010f61cb298f496197a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Cisco Security Advisories TM">ae588991db082010c81a7b82399619db</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {
	/*var logger = new Cisco_BCS_SNLogger();
    var daoScript = new Cisco_DAOScript();
    try {
        logger.debug("Inside security advisories transform map.");
        var sys_id = daoScript.getReferenceMapping("securityAdvisoryBulletins", "psirt_cold_id", target.psirt_cold_id);
        target.psirt_cold_id_ref = sys_id;

        var sys_id_dev = daoScript.getReferenceMapping("devices", "device_id", target.device_id);
        target.deviceid_ref = sys_id_dev;
        target.update();
    } catch (e) {
        logger.error("Exception caught inside security advisories Transform map. Error : - " + e);
    }*/

	var dao = new Cisco_DAOScript();

	// Devices B
	var resultDevices = dao.createReferences(target.device_id, "device_id", "psirt_cold_id", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_devices", true);
	if(resultDevices){
		target.deviceid_ref = resultDevices + "";
		target.update();
	}

	// PSirt Bulletin S
	var resultSecAdvBulletin = dao.createReferences(target.psirt_cold_id, "psirt_cold_id", "", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_security_advisories_bulletins", false);
	if(resultSecAdvBulletin){
		target.psirt_cold_id_ref = resultSecAdvBulletin + "";
		target.update();
	}

	var calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_security_advisories","","match_confidence=Vulnerable^device_id=" + target.device_id + "");
	dao.updateCalculatedField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_devices","device_id="+target.device_id+"","vulnerable_security_advisories",calculatedFieldValue);

	calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_security_advisories","","match_confidence=Potentially Vulnerable^device_id=" + target.device_id + "");
	dao.updateCalculatedField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_devices","device_id="+target.device_id+"","potentially_vulnerable_security_advisories",calculatedFieldValue);
	
	calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_security_advisories","","match_confidence=Vulnerable^psirt_cold_id=" + target.psirt_cold_id + "");
	dao.updateCalculatedField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_security_advisories_bulletins","psirt_cold_id="+target.psirt_cold_id+"","vulnerable_devices_count",calculatedFieldValue);

	calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_security_advisories","","match_confidence=Potentially Vulnerable^psirt_cold_id=" + target.psirt_cold_id + "");
	dao.updateCalculatedField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_security_advisories_bulletins","psirt_cold_id="+target.psirt_cold_id+"","potentially_vulnerable_devices_count",calculatedFieldValue);

	// 	target.update();

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harsh.gupta</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-03 08:15:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>15609efcdb58e010f61cb298f496197a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onAfter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights" source="x_caci_cisco_bcs">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_15609efcdb58e010f61cb298f496197a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-17 09:19:28</sys_updated_on><when>onAfter</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
